import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.scss'], }) export class TodoComponent { tasks = [ { id: 1, text: 'task 1', complete: false, edit: false, }, { id: 2, text: 'task 2', complete: true, edit: false, }, { id: 3, text: 'task 2', complete: true, edit: false, }, ]; todoText = ''; lastCount = this.tasks.length; constructor() { setTimeout(() => { this.tasks[0].complete = true; }, 3000); } toggleTask(id: number) { const findTask = this.tasks.find((t) => t.id === id); if (findTask) { findTask.complete = !findTask.complete; } console.log(findTask); } addTodo() { this.tasks.push({ id: ++this.lastCount, text: this.todoText, complete: false, edit: false, }); this.todoText = ''; } deleteTodo(id: number) { this.tasks = this.tasks.filter((t) => t.id !== id); } deleteTasks() { this.tasks = []; } submitEdit(text: string) { this.tasks = []; } }
